After rebuild your package(s) will end up in the latest IVI snapshot repositories:
i586 atom repository: https://download.tizen.org/snapshots/tizen/ivi/latest/repos/atom/
i586 emulator repository: https://download.tizen.org/snapshots/tizen/ivi/latest/repos/emulator/
-
You can find latest snapshot images in the latest IVI snapshot repository:
i586 EFI image: https://download.tizen.org/snapshots/tizen/ivi/latest/images/atom/ivi-efi-i586/
i586 MBR image: https://download.tizen.org/snapshots/tizen/ivi/latest/images/atom/ivi-mbr-i586/
i586 MBR emulator image: https://download.tizen.org/snapshots/tizen/ivi/latest/images/emulator/ivi-mbr-i586-emul/
-
Your package(s) will be included into the next daily release.
-
